name: For Love and Wine
description:
Welcome to a competition like no other! Your puny mortal prayers have been answered and you've been invited to make wine worthy enough for the gods. You will compete with beings you thought weren't even real, but I assure you they are very real and very date-able!

Game controls:

  • Left-click to select
  • Enter key to advance text

That's it!

Beautiful art by JangoKirby

Bopping music by Wrenwick

Writing by ThugBatman, JangoKirby and Wrenwick

Programming by Saulizimo

After downloading both files, create a folder and place the files inside. Double click InWineThereisLove.exe and the game should start running!
